item.title: Access to storage
item.description: IMPORTANT: Please see also Understanding new JASMIN storage which explains more about the different types of storage as of Phase 4 of JASMIN’s history.

item.title: Requesting resources
item.description: How projects and resources are managed   Resouces on JASMIN, such as storage and compute, are allocated to science communities separated into “consortia”.
